Title: The Hippocampus-prefrontal cortex circuit in spatial memory
Statement: spatial memory depends on functional connectivity between Hippocampus and prefrontal cortex

Title: The Hippocampus-prefrontal cortex circuit in episodic memory
Statement: episodic memory depends on functional connectivity between Hippocampus and prefrontal cortex

Title: The Prefrontal Cortex-hippocampus circuit in working memory
Statement: working memory depends on functional connectivity between Prefrontal Cortex and hippocampus

Title: The Prefrontal Cortex-hippocampus circuit in decision making
Statement: decision making depends on functional connectivity between Prefrontal Cortex and hippocampus
